name: connorvg/laravel-transform
description: An array transformer, built for APIs, w/ Laravel bindings (Laravel not required)

suggest.connorvg/php-wtf: A PHP implementation of my WholeTextFunctions library
suggest.connorvg/php-slack: An Eloquent ORM styled PHP implementation for the Slack API w/ Laravel binds to help out Laravel lovers

suggest.connorvg/laravel-permissions: A Laravel permissions package that uses keys rather than roles
